comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; nl; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 BTRS28059 Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; nl; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101203 BTRS28059 Firefox/3.6.13

If i have saved multiple tabs with for example youtube videos and i start it up again (so it opens all these tabs the next time) they all begin to play at once. 

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.open multiple tabs on youtube
2.close firefox
3.save the tabs
4.open firefox with saved tabs
Actual Results:  
it plays all youtube video's at once 

Expected Results:  
play 1 or none
comments.creator: jesse_reus@hotmail.com
